GenAIConversationSummary.name: GenAIConversationSummary
GenAIConversationSummary.description: Represents a generated summary of a voice or video call.

ConversationRecordId.description: The unique ID of the related voice or video call record.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only for organizations with the multicurrency feature enabled. Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization.

ErrorMessage.description: An error message when there is a problem with sharing the conversation summary.

Source.description: Whether the summary shown is content generated by Einstein or subsequently edited by a user.
